NSCameraUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your camera to take photos of your beauty services and profile.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your photo library to select photos for your profile and services.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your location to find nearby beauty service providers.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Lamsa needs access to your location to find nearby beauty service providers.
NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Lamsa needs to send you notifications about your bookings and appointments.
NSContactsUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your contacts to help you share services with friends.
NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your calendar to schedule your beauty appointments.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Lamsa needs access to your microphone for voice messages and video calls with providers.
